about.summary: Calculates classic and/or bootstrap confidence intervals for many parameters such as the population mean, variance, interquartile range (IQR), median absolute deviation (MAD), skewness, kurtosis, Cramer's V, odds ratio, R-squared, quantiles (incl. median), proportions, different types of correlation measures, difference in means, quantiles and medians. Many of the classic confidence intervals are described in Smithson, M. (2003, ISBN: 978-0761924999). Bootstrap confidence intervals are calculated with the R package 'boot'. Both one- and two-sided intervals are supported.

Calculates classic and/or bootstrap confidence intervals for many parameters such as the population mean, variance, interquartile range (IQR), median absolute deviation (MAD), skewness, kurtosis, Cramer's V, odds ratio, R-squared, quantiles (incl. median), proportions, different types of correlation measures, difference in means, quantiles and medians. Many of the classic confidence intervals are described in Smithson, M. (2003, ISBN: 978-0761924999). Bootstrap confidence intervals are calculated with the R package 'boot'. Both one- and two-sided intervals are supported.

name: r-confintr
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.2.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-confintr
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/confintr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/confintr/confintr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 6f315e8bd01d79701f30dd7c31267b216a284dd53dead607b2d856edcbcef7fe

build:
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-boot
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-boot

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('confintr')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('confintr')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/mayer79/confintr
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: "Calculates classic and/or bootstrap confidence intervals for many parameters such as the population mean, variance, interquartile range (IQR), median absolute deviation (MAD), skewness, kurtosis, Cramer's V, odds ratio, R-squared, quantiles (incl. median), proportions, different types of correlation measures,\
    \ difference in means, quantiles and medians. Many of the classic confidence intervals are described in Smithson, M. (2003, ISBN: 978-0761924999). Bootstrap confidence intervals are calculated with the R package 'boot'. Both one- and two-sided intervals are supported."
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
